rows.label: bf04030170_0030
rows.name:
The one who awakened Hikari was Adel, 
hero of the ancient kingdom of Iira.

rows.label: bf04030170_0040
rows.name:
Adel fought as Hikari's Driver 
to protect the world.

rows.label: bf04030170_0050
rows.name:
We Divine Beasts played our part
in that battle, too.

rows.label: bf04030170_0060
rows.name: 'Living with humans' is the fate of us, Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf04030170_0080
rows.name: Adel hid the sleeping Homura in a ship.

rows.label: bf04030170_0090
rows.name:
And sank it deep into the Cloud Sea floor 
where no one's hands could reach.

rows.label: bf04030170_0100
rows.name: So that day, that's the ship that we...

rows.label: bf04030170_0110
rows.name: I think our meeting was... fate.

rows.label: bf04030170_0120
rows.name:
Otherwise, Hikari-chan would 
never have woken up.

rows.label: bf04030170_0140
rows.name:
Hikari-chan and I used to talk together,
in that dream of Eden where you met me.

rows.label: bf04030170_0150
rows.name:
We said that when the time came for us to awaken, 
we would return to Eden.

rows.label: bf04030170_0160
rows.name: Return and fulfill our true purpose.

rows.label: bf04030170_0170
rows.name: Does that mean defeating Metsu again?
